titleStmt.title: Loves companion, or, A short treatise of the nature, necessity, and advantages of moderation being the substance of two sermons preached at Ousburne, By J. H. M.A. and minsiter of Ousburne.
titleStmt.author: Hunter, Josiah, minister in York.

notesStmt.note: The dedication is signed: Josiah Hunter.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
